item.description:
We had such a good time tonight (Pre-party @ The Precinct), that I'm attempting an encore.

The Sea Monsters are performing at The Precinct at 10pm on Sunday night. I will be at the Precinct from 9pm - ??? (maybe 2am...but at least 11:30pm).

Please feel free to stop by just to say hello and to meet some new friends from 9 - 10 PM. Please come in the door on the left and you will find us somewhere in that area of the bar. At 10PM, we will head into the backroom to see the SEA MONSTERS and dance the night away.

The Sea Monsters' show is posted on several meetup pages so there's a possibility for quite a crowd...good times!!!
item.how_to_find_us: Go to the left half of the bar...if you arrive after 10PM, send me a text msg (I'll send the number in an email tomorrow) or just look for me
item.name: Precinct PART 2
